name: ralrimdvv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(w0, wi(w1, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w2))))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w2)))

stmt.origin: ex(w0, w1, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w2))))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w2))))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w2)))

stmt.origin: ralrimivv(s0, s1, c0, c1, wa(w0, w1), w2)
stmt.pretty: ralrimivv(s0, s1, c0, c1, (w0 ∧ w1), w2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w2)))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w2))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, wa(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s1, wa(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w2))))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w2))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, wa(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s1, wa(w0, w1))

stmt.origin: imp(w0, w1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w2)))

|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w2))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, wa(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s1, wa(w0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w2)))

body.origin:
|- diffsw(s0, wa(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w2))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsw(s1, wa(w0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w2)))

comment: Inference from Theorem 19.21 of [Margaris] p. 90. (Restricted quantifier version with double quantification.) (Contributed by NM, 1-Jun-2005.)
